title: War Sci-Fi Dark Ambient Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring eighteen science fiction instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present the War Sci-Fi Dark Ambient Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains eighteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of science fiction. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:

Audio Preview:

Video Preview:
